meanings.definition: A person who keeps bees for the production of honey.
meanings.sent1: The apiculturists collected honey from their beehives.
meanings.sent2: Many apiculturists enjoy tending to their bees and harvesting honey.
meanings.sent3: The apiculturists had a sweet job, literally!
meanings.sent4: Like skilled gatherers of golden nectar, apiculturists diligently tend to their buzzing treasures.
meanings.sent5: The diligent apiculturists carefully tended to their buzzing friends to gather the sweet reward of honey.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the practice of beekeeping.
meanings.sent1: Local apiculturists sell fresh honey at the farmer's market.
meanings.sent2: The apiculturists in the community share tips on beekeeping techniques.
meanings.sent3: The apiculturists had a buzzing good time at their beekeeping workshop.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nature's stewards, apiculturists stand as guardians of the bee kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated apiculturists work tirelessly to ensure the well-being of their bee colonies.
